Service Details: Offers dental services that include crowns and bridges, veneers, composite bonding, bleaching, implants, periowave cold laser disinfection of infected gum pockets, cavitron/handscaling, emergency care, root canals, extractions, and temporaries
Hours: Mon: 10:00am - 6:00pmTue-Thu: 8:00am - 4:30pmFri: appointment available upon requestSat-Sun and holidays: closed
